dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 你好，考虑急性腹泻病，多见不洁饮食，感染，口服妈咪爱思密达，多喝水或口服补液盐
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOBIOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 建议查大便常规以便准确用药
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 我家宝宝一口水都不喝，就给他吃妈咪爱可以吗
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 不行，已经3天了，防止脱水，不利于恢复
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 孩子小慎重
dialogue-content.label: OOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 那去药店买点盐水喝行吗，再观察一天
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 补液盐，思密达用上
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 最多观察一天，不适及时就医
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 吃上面两种药，妈咪爱就不吃了，还是补液盐喝妈咪爱
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 口服妈咪爱思密达补液盐
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 一共3个
dialogue-content.label: OOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 思密达严格按说明服用
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 妈咪爱和思密达不都是止泻的吗
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 妈咪爱帮助改善肠道菌群，思密达吸附病毒和有害物质
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 保护肠粘膜
dialogue-content.label: OOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 好的，明白了，那他三个月大概喝多少思密达
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 嗯，那就好，还有问题吗
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 思密达大概喝多少
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 一袋用50ml水冲，喝多少事多少，尽量多点
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 好的，谢谢
dialogue-content.label: OOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 不客气
dialogue-content.label: OOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 还有问题吗
dialogue-content.label: OOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 没有了
dialogue-content.label: OOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 再见
dialogue-content.label: OO
